title: following regulations apply would not offend against principles of proper
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Planning and Development
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Planning and Development 

(Street Furniture Fees) Regulations 2024. 

(2) These regulations and the Planning and Development Regulations 2001 
to 2023 shall be construed as one and may be collectively cited as the Planning 
and Development Regulations 2001 to 2024. 

Amendment of Part 1 of Schedule 12 to the Principal Regulations
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited planning development (street furniture fees) regulation 2024 (2) regulation planning development regulation 2001 2023 shall construed one may collectively cited planning development regulation 2001 2024 amendment part 1 schedule 12 principal regulation

title: following regulations apply would not offend against principles of proper
heading: 2. For the period up to and including 31 December 2024, Part 1 of
text_raw:
2. For the period up to and including 31 December 2024, Part 1 of 
Schedule 12 of the Planning and Development Regulations 2001 (S.I. No. 600 
of 2001) is amended by the substitution in Column 2 – Licence Fee, of – 

“€0 per table” for “€125 per table” 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 14th May, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 opposite the mention in Column 1 – Appliance, Apparatus or Structure, of – 

“(h) Tables and chairs outside a hotel, restaurant, public house or other 
establishment where food is sold for consumption on the premises”. 

[196] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

9 May, 2024. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [196]
